item.title: Fly tipping got friends, 13th October
item.description:
On Saturday this was a mattress and some carpet. So people see that and think they can just dump their stuff as well. When will councils learn, clean it up quick before it attracts more fly tipping. It’s now blocking access to the pavement.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hylton Street, Plumstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: A man in a van flytipped an entire bathroom at the bins Medina House, 13th October
item.description:
A man emptied his hire van of an entire bathroom which he has presumably stripped out. The van reg is NU17 0BJ. I called the police but they came after he left. There is a bath, toilet etc and a load of walls and rubble bags.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Torridge Gardens, Nunhead, London
Report on FixMyStreet
